text: Ultimate Spider-Man is a 2005 action-adventure video game based on the Marvel Comics series. ==Gameplay== The player can play as either Spidey or Venom. Spidey can swing around New York wherever he wants. Venom can gain health by eating people and can destroy New York. ==Release== The PlayStation 2 game came with two versions, a regular edition and a special edition with Venom on the cover. The special edition comes with a bonus DVD showing how the game was made. ==Reception== The game had mixed to positive signals. title: Ultimate Spider-Man (video game)
